english.segment1: You're my Lord God. And I will praise you forever. Ever will I let my song rise to you. You're my Lord God. And I will praise you forever. Ever will I let my song rise to you
english.segment2: Chorus: I will sing unto a brand new song. Worship and praises raise from my heart all day long. For you are my God. And you are my King. Let praises ring
english.segment3: You're my Lord God. The heavens declare your glory. You are so mighty and Holy is your Name. You're my Lord God. The heavens declare your glory. You are so mighty and Holy is your Name
